# rema-stac

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rema-stac is to play around with pystac and STAC generally. 

See https://github.com/AustralianAntarcticDivision/remav2 for a vastly simpler way to hit up this tile mosaic.
